title: Improve WPF 3D
body: In general, simply invest in improving the 3D framework. Specifically, add the ability (for users) to create and instantiate high level 3D elements in xaml (e.g. allow Cube, Cylinder, Sphere, etc. to be "native" WPF objects).

comments.body: why not port WPF / XAML 3D port to universal apps too (would make good use when deployed onto HoloLens too I think)?
I'd also like to see continued support for WPF3D as a retained-mode 3D API with consistent integration with WPF.
